definition: to stay up late or all night
to cook on a slow fire/to extract by heating/to decoct/to endure

sentences.english: Avoid late nights if you can, because you probably can't avoid early morning classes.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以請避免熬夜，因爲你無法逃避早課。

sentences.english: Don't stay up late on the weekends.
You need not stay up at night seeking vengeance.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要熬夜去尋找報復的方法。

sentences.english: Oh, let me guess. You were cramming for the test or busy with the crib sheet?
sentences.chinese: 我猜猜。你昨天是爲考試熬夜還是忙着做小抄？

sentences.english: The boy tried palaver his motherintoletting him stay up later.
sentences.chinese: 男孩想要跟他的母親羅哩八嗦，讓他熬夜得較晚。

sentences.english: He sits late at night as well as working hard during the day.
sentences.chinese: 他不但白天努力工作，夜裏還常熬夜。

sentences.english: I stayed up late to watch the final game of the World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 我熬夜看了世界盃決賽。

sentences.english: I have to cram all night for tomorrow's exams.
sentences.chinese: 爲了明天的考試，我得熬夜臨陣磨槍。

sentences.english: Today, I was studying late and kept hearing weird screeching sounds from outside.
sentences.chinese: 今天我熬夜看書，聽到外面一直有奇怪的噝噝聲。
我的英語老師經常熬夜到晚上11點。

sentences.english: I have to pull an all-nighter to get this project done。
sentences.chinese: 我得熬夜把這個項目做完。

sentences.english: It is also a tradition to stay up late during the festival, playing mahjong or singing karaoke.
sentences.chinese: 熬夜打麻將或唱卡拉OK是春節的另一個傳統。

sentences.english: Many college students stay up very late at night chatting in bed.
sentences.chinese: 很多大學生晚上熬夜很晚開臥談會。

sentences.english: Tom chose to sleep in after staying up late the night before.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆由於昨晚熬夜，所以賴牀了。

sentences.english: We will have to stay up late if we want to complete this project.
sentences.chinese: 我們如果想要完成這個研究計畫就勢必要熬夜。

sentences.english: On New Year's Eve, people always stay up late, which is called "Shousui".
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜裏，人們通常都會熬夜，這被稱爲“守歲”。

definition: early to bed, early to rise/to keep early hours
to burn the midnight oil/to work late into the night
to adjust to a different time zone
baldness/to lose hair or feathers/to molt/depilation
